robust-pca API¶

Classes¶

classes.pcp_rpca.PcpRPCA(signal, period, D, …)

This class implements the basic RPCA decomposition using Alternating Lagrangian Multipliers.

classes.graph_rpca.GraphRPCA(signal, period, …)

This class implements Fast Robust PCA on Graphs using the FISTA algorithm

classes.graph_rpca.GraphRPCAHyperparams(…)

This class implements the graph RPCA with hyperparameters’ selection

classes.temporal_rpca.TemporalRPCA(signal, …)

This class implements a noisy version of the so-called improved RPCA

classes.temporal_rpca.TemporalRPCAHyperparams(…)

This class implements the noisy RPCA with hyperparameters’ selection

classes.temporal_rpca.OnlineTemporalRPCA(…)

This class implements an online version of Temporal RPCA that processes one sample per time instance and hence its memory cost is independent of the number of samples It is based on stochastic optimization of an equivalent reformulation of the batch TemporalRPCA

Utils¶

utils.utils.get_period(signal)

Retrieve the “period” of a series based on the ACF

utils.utils.signal_to_matrix(signal, period)

Shape a time series into a matrix

utils.utils.approx_rank(M[, th])

Estimate a superior rank of a matrix M by SVD

utils.utils.proximal_operator(U, X, threshold)

Compute the proximal operator with L1 norm

utils.utils.soft_thresholding(X, threshold)

Apply the shrinkage operator (i.e.

utils.utils.svd_thresholding(X, threshold)

Apply the shrinkage operator to the singular values obtained from the SVD of X.

utils.utils.ortho_proj(M, omega[, inv])

orthogonal projection of matrix M onto the linear space of matrices supported on omega

utils.utils.toeplitz_matrix(T, dimension, model)

Create a matrix Toeplitz matrix H to take into account temporal correlation via HX H=Toeplitz(0,1,-1), in which the central diagonal is defined as ones and the T upper diagonal is defined as negative ones.

utils.utils.construct_graph(X[, …])

Construct a graph based on the distance (similarity) between data

utils.drawing.plot_matrices(list_matrices[, …])

Plot RPCA matrices

utils.drawing.plot_signal(list_signals[, …])

Plot RPCA results for time series

utils.drawing.plot_images(M, A, E, …[, …])

Plot multiple images in 3 columns for original, background and “foreground”
